articles.title: ‘Deplorable’: Ponting blasts glaring Aussie issue - news.com.au
articles.description: Making just one run over the final two overs nearly put an end to Australia’s World Cup winning run and moved former skipper Ricky Ponting to dub the middle and late effort against New Zealanders in Dharamsala as “deplorable”.
